long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Super Mario Bros" for Chrome Extension allows you to play the classic Super Mario Bros game right in your web browser. This free extension brings the iconic Nintendo game to your Chrome browser, letting you relive the nostalgic experience of jumping and platforming through the Mushroom Kingdom. Whether you're looking for a quick gaming break or want to revisit this timeless title, the "Super Mario Bros" for Chrome Extension provides an easy way to play the game anytime, anywhere. You can also access and play a variety of other free unblocked games on the Classroom 6x website at https://classroom-6x.org.

*Note:We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
